_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The message to be conveyed to the Buddha: The mendicant Assaji is sick, suffering, gravely ill.
He bows with his head to your feet.
Sir, please go to the mendicant Assaji out of compassion.
The understanding of the ascetics and br: They equate immersion with the ascetic life.
They truly see that form and consciousness are impermanent.
They understand that there is no return to any state of existence.
They feel detached from pleasant, painful, and neutral feelings.
They understand that everything that’s felt, being no longer relished, will become cool right here.
